TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SubscribeContextCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Defines a callback method that will be invoked when a context item changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This callback provides a mechanism for interested parties in both the host and the workflow designer to subscribe to updates to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem> published to the editing context of the workflow designer.
